Configuration.Name: L1=4m_L2=2m
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 1200 config.det_offset = -5 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.66 config.beamcenterz = 96.27 config.drive()
